title: S16 Ep92: The Ghosts of Greystone w/Clete Keith
itunes:title: The Ghosts of Greystone w/Clete Keith
description:
Darkness Radio presents The Ghosts of Greystone with guest Clete Keith

For more than two decades, the mystery surrounding the strange events taking place in and around Greystone Mansion have been suppressed, ignored, and disbelieved… until now.
  
The historic Greystone Estate sits atop 18.3 acres in the beautiful City of Beverly Hills. While it may offer spectacular panoramic views and amazing history, many visitors have experienced something unexpected—paranormal activity. The notorious murder/suicide of Ned Doheny and his secretary, Hugh Plunkett, are not the only deaths linked to this home, and it appears that once the Doheny family moved out in 1955, other unwelcome ‘visitors’ moved in!

Clete Keith worked from an office on the Greystone estate for over two decades, and his book, Ghosts of Greystone - Beverly Hills, is a remarkable collection of over 230 Beverly Hills ghost stories, and a landmark exposé of eyewitness accounts detailing supernatural activity associated with this extraordinary location.

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3lNYFOn

Get signed copies here: www.ghostsofgreystone.com
